page.title: 07AGRICULTURE (LAMPHEY)
page.content: The area around Lamphey is mainly farmland.Although some crops are grown the principal interest of farmers is dairying and beef cattle rearing.In this context large acreages are put down to grassland either for grazing or for hay or silage making for winter feed. The small amount of arable land is used for potatoes,corn or winter vegetables. Some farmers have experimented with cash crops such as peas,beans and even soft fruit.The constant wind ,however, has made such crops uneconomical to grow. The main early potato growing area in the county is more to the West and North
